statements: DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 AND emission_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01' AND emission_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM emissions_data WHERE plant_id = 5 AND timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM plants WHERE industry_type = 'Chemical' AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM Inspections WHERE plant_id = 1 AND inspection_date = '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM Inspections WHERE plant_id = 100 AND inspector_name = 'John Smith'
DELETE FROM EmissionsData WHERE plant_id = 200 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
